text:
需要協助嗎？
您可以隨時通過以下網站查看、更改或取消您的預訂：
[redacted_url]
如對飯店有任何疑問，您可以直接聯繫阿麗雅度假酒店和賭場，請撥
打：[redacted_number]
或者致電我們 - 我們全天24⼩時為您服務：
當地電話號碼： [redacted_number]
國外或美國: [redacted_number]
旅⾏途中仍與 [redacted_url] 保持聯繫！ 連結⽅式：
trans:
Do you need any help?
You may view, change or cancel your reservation at any time at the following website:
[redacted_url]
If you have any questions about the hotel, you may contact ARIA Resort & Casino directly by
calling: [redacted_number]
Or give us a call - we're at your service 24 hours a day:
Local phone number: [redacted_number]
Oversea or United States: [redacted_number]
Stay connected with [redacted_url] while traveling! Link:
